```{r}
library(RPostgres)
wrds <- dbConnect(Postgres(),
                  host='wrds-pgdata.wharton.upenn.edu',
                  port=9737,
                  dbname='wrds',
                  sslmode='require',
                  user='kgpcbs'
                  )
```


```{r}
res <- dbSendQuery(wrds, "select * from crsp.dsf")
data <- dbFetch(res, n=10)
dbClearResult(res)
data
```
